text: In this mod you require Sun to make plants.
$(br2)Sun producing is not as simple as planting a sunflower in the safety of your basement and letting it make Sun forever.
$(br2)When the Sun-producing Plant is ready to make Sun, it will try to find a Zombie nearby.
$(br2)The range is according to the "Zombie Sun Radius", and the Zombies need to be at most 4 blocks below or above the Plant,
if there are no Zombies, it will withhold the Sun, if there's at least one, it will continue the Sun production.
$(br)These Zombies then have to die, as those Plants won't make sun if the same Zombies are still there.
